StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [SP_RECRUIT_TRAINING]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
as
declare @ssn varchar(9), @person_id int, @nwa_id int, @contract_id int, @ship_id int, @grad_date date.me, @ship_date date.me, @date_arrived date.me, @discharge_date date.me, @user_login varchar(15), @update_date date.me
declare recruit cursor for
select SSN, convert(date.me,CADB,112), convert(date.me,GRAD_DATE,112), convert(date.me,DTE_ARR_REC,112), convert(date.me,DISCHARG_DTE,112)
from arms..ARMS179
open recruit
fetch recruit into
@ssn, @ship_date, @grad_date, @date_arrived,@discharge_date
while (@@fetch_status = 0)
begin --here we go
set @user_login = 'migra.on' set @update_date = getdate()
--ge.ng the PERSON_ID set @person_id = (select PERSON_ID from PERSON where SOCIAL_SECURITY_NUMBER = @ssn)
--ge.ng the NWA_ID set @nwa_id = (select NWA_ID from NWA where MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @person_id)
--ge.ng the CONTRACT_ID set @contract_id = (select CONTRACT_ID from CONTRACT where NWA_ID = @nwa_id)
--ge.ng the SHIPPER_ID set @ship_id = (select SHIP_ID from SHIPPER where CONTRACT_ID = @contract_id)
if @ship_id is not NULL begin if not exists(select 1 from RECRUIT_TRAINING where SHIP_ID = @ship_id) begin insert into RECRUIT_TRAINING (SHIP_ID, SHIP_DATE, PROJECTED_COMPL_DATE, GRADUATION_DATE, DATE_ARRIVED_TRAINING, DROP_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE)
values (@ship_id, @ship_date, @grad_date, @grad_date, @date_arrived,@discharge_date, @user_login, @update_date)
print @ssn+'Added to RECRUIT_TRAINING'
end print @ssn+'Already in RECRUIT_TRAINING'
end print @ssn+'_ Not a valid shipper'
fetch recruit into
@ssn, @ship_date, @grad_date, @date_arrived,@discharge_date
end --we are .nished
close recruit
deallocate recruit
